summary: The diff implements most visual trading marker requirements on the CandlestickChart component including entry points, take-profit levels, stop-loss markers, and pattern tooltips with cyberpunk styling. Trade recommendations are generated and passed to the chart. However, evidence for mobile optimization (REQ-54) is not present in the truncated diff.
